title: How to Do Paper Tole

steps.headline: You will need a starter kit that you  can get from your local craft store or online.
Get a minimum of 5 identical pictures, more is preferred.
Ensure that you have a shaper, cutters, brush silicone, and a plastic place mat or fun foam for shaping and contouring.
Glue down one picture to a corrugated board.
You will have the effect as a back ground, middle ground and foreground, starting with the background.
With your remaining prints, cut out certain parts of your picture that you would like to make stand out.
steps.description: Cut as many layers as you need to reach your desired look.

steps.headline: Dab a drop of silicone to make each piece that you cut stand out.
Follow this step until you get the effect you are after for each layer.

tyn: picture frame minimum 2.5 inches (6.4 cm) thick
text: You will need a starter kit that you  can get from your local craft store or online.  Get a minimum of 5 identical pictures, more is preferred.  Ensure that you have a shaper, cutters, brush silicone, and a plastic place mat or fun foam for shaping and contouring.  Glue down one picture to a corrugated board.  You will have the effect as a back ground, middle ground and foreground, starting with the background.  With your remaining prints, cut out certain parts of your picture that you would like to make stand out. Cut as many layers as you need to reach your desired look. Dab a drop of silicone to make each piece that you cut stand out.  Follow this step until you get the effect you are after for each layer.
sentences: You will need a starter kit that you  can get from your local craft store or online.
Get a minimum of 5 identical pictures, more is preferred.
Ensure that you have a shaper, cutters, brush silicone, and a plastic place mat or fun foam for shaping and contouring.
Glue down one picture to a corrugated board.
You will have the effect as a back ground, middle ground and foreground, starting with the background.
With your remaining prints, cut out certain parts of your picture that you would like to make stand out.
Cut as many layers as you need to reach your desired look.
Dab a drop of silicone to make each piece that you cut stand out.
Follow this step until you get the effect you are after for each layer.
